headline: Is Baker Hughes a Bargain After 17.6% Year-to-Date Rally in 2025?
summary: Ever wondered if Baker Hughes is trading at an attractive price or if there is still room for the stock to run? You are not alone. Let's dive into the value story behind this well-known energy company. Baker Hughes has been making moves lately, climbing 17.6% year to date and rising 12.8% over the past 12 months, with a notable 180.8% return over five years. Much of this momentum traces back to ongoing activity in the global energy sector, highlighted by investments in clean energy...
